item.title: Meta 达成在中国销售 VR 耳机的协议 - 华尔街日报
item.description:
Meta Platforms (META.O) has struck a deal with Tencent Holdings (0700.HK) to sell a new, lower-priced version of its virtual-reality (VR) headset in China, a return to the country 14 years after Facebook was shut out, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.翻译:Meta Platforms (META.O)与腾讯控股(0700.HK)达成协议，将在中国销售一款新的低价版虚拟现实 (VR) 头戴设备，这是 Facebook 收购 14 年后重返中国的机会。据《华尔街日报》周四报道，该公司被拒之门外。

The preliminary deal will make Tencent the exclusive seller of Meta's headsets in China, the Journal said, citing sources.翻译:《华尔街日报》援引消息人士的话称，初步协议将使腾讯成为 Meta 耳机在中国的独家销售商。

Tencent will start selling the headset beginning late 2024, the report added.翻译:报道补充称，腾讯将于 2024 年底开始销售这款耳机。

Meta and Tencent did not immediately respond to Reuters' requests for comment.翻译:Meta 和腾讯没有立即回应路透社的置评请求。

Facebook has been banned in China since 2009.翻译:Facebook自2009年起在中国被禁止。

Reporting by Shubham Kalia in Bengaluru; Editing by Rashmi Aich and Mrigank Dhaniwala翻译:Shubham Kalia 班加罗尔报道；编辑：Rashmi Aich 和 Mrigank Dhaniwala

item.title: 苹果供应商立讯精密将在越南北部追加投资 3.3 亿美元
item.description:
Apple (AAPL.O) supplier Luxshare Precision Industry Co (002475.SZ) has been awarded a license to invest an additional $330 million in its plant in Vietnam's northern province of Bac Giang, raising the total investment to $504 million, provincial authorities said.翻译:越南北部省份北江省表示，苹果公司(AAPL.O)供应商立讯精密工业有限公司(002475.SZ)已获得许可，可对其位于越南北部北江省的工厂追加投资 3.3 亿美元，使总投资达到 5.04 亿美元。

The new facility at Luxshare-ICT, Luxshare's arm in Vietnam, will be on a plot of 29.1 hectares (72 acres) and will produce cables for smart devices, communications equipment, touch pens, smart positioning tags and smartwatches, Bac Giang authorities said in a statement dated Wednesday.翻译:北江省当局表示，立讯精密在越南的子公司 Luxshare-ICT 的新工厂占地 29.1 公顷（72 英亩），将生产用于智能设备、通信设备、触摸笔、智能定位标签和智能手表的电缆。周三的一份声明。

The facility is expected to be completed in 12 to 24 months, it added.翻译:它补充说，该设施预计将在 12 至 24 个月内完工。

China-based Luxshare, one of Apple's main AirPods makers, started investing in Vietnam since 2019. Its additional investment in the country comes as other manufacturers seek to further diversify production away from China.翻译:苹果的主要 AirPods 制造商之一、总部位于中国的立讯精密自 2019 年起开始在越南投资。该公司在该国追加投资之际，其他制造商正寻求进一步实现生产多元化，远离中国。

Earlier this year, another Apple supplier, Foxconn, set up a new factory in central Vietnam and raised its investment in the country by $250 million to make electric vehicles and telecom parts.翻译:今年早些时候，另一家苹果供应商富士康在越南中部设立了一家新工厂，并增加了在该国的投资 2.5 亿美元，用于生产电动汽车和电信零部件。

Luxshare did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:立讯精密没有立即回应置评请求。

Reporting by Phuong Nguyen; Editing by Lincoln Feast.翻译:Phuong Nguyen 报道；林肯·盛宴编辑。

item.title: 中国海警敦促菲律宾停止侵犯主权
item.description:
China's coast guard on Friday urged the Philippines to stop infringing on the country's sovereignty after several Philippine resupply vessels entered into waters near the Second Thomas Shoal in the South China Sea.翻译:周五，在几艘菲律宾补给船进入南海仁爱礁附近海域后，中国海警敦促菲律宾停止侵犯中国主权。

The Philippine National Security Council said it would issue a statement soon on the resupply mission.翻译:菲律宾国家安全委员会表示将很快就补给任务发表声明。

China's coast guard said two small Philippine transport ships and three coast guard ships entered the waters adjacent to the Second Thomas Shoal, part of the Spratly Islands, without the permission of the Chinese government.翻译:中国海警表示，两艘菲律宾小型运输船和三艘海警船未经中国政府许可，进入南沙群岛仁爱礁附近海域。

The shoal is in the Philippines' exclusive economic zone under the United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea.翻译:根据《联合国海洋法公约》，该浅滩位于菲律宾的专属经济区。

China rejects that and says it has sovereignty over the Spratlys, known in China as the Nansha Islands, and its adjacent waters.翻译:中国对此予以否认，并表示中国对南沙群岛（中国称为南沙群岛）及其附近海域拥有主权。

The two countries have had several confrontations during the past few months in the region, and China has condemned Philippine resupply missions to the shoal. 　　 　　　翻译:过去几个月，两国在该地区发生了数次对抗，中国谴责菲律宾向该浅滩执行补给任务。

"The China coast guard has followed Philippine vessels in accordance with the law, taken control measures, and made temporary special arrangements for the Philippine side to transport food and other necessary daily necessities," the coast guard said in a statement.翻译:中国海警局已依法对菲律宾船只进行跟踪、管控，并为菲方运输食品等必要生活物资作出临时特殊安排。

"We urge the Philippines to immediately stop its violations of China's territorial sovereignty," the statement said.翻译:声明说：“我们敦促菲律宾立即停止侵犯中国领土主权的行为。”

Reporting by Beijing newsroom; Writing by Bernard Orr; Editing by Christopher Cushing and Gerry Doyle翻译:北京新闻编辑室报道；伯纳德·奥尔撰写；克里斯托弗·库欣和格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: c.bank顾问：中国可以提高2024年预算赤字率以刺激增长
item.description:
China can raise its budget deficit ratio next year to support the economic recovery because there is still space for the central government to issue more debt, Wang Yiming, a policy adviser to the central bank, said on Friday.翻译:央行政策顾问王一鸣周五表示，中国明年可以提高预算赤字率以支持经济复苏，因为中央政府仍有发行更多债务的空间。

"In the short term, we need to increase the intensity of fiscal policy," Wang, a member of the Monetary Policy Committee of the People's Bank of China (PBOC), said at the Caixin Summit in Beijing.翻译:“短期来看，我们需要加大财政政策力度，”中国人民银行货币政策委员会委员王毅在北京举行的财新峰会上表示。

"The central government's leverage ratio is relatively low and there is still a lot of room."翻译:“中央政府的杠杆率还比较低，还有很大的空间。”

A higher budget deficit next year will help drive the country's economic recovery, he said.翻译:他说，明年更高的预算赤字将有助于推动该国的经济复苏。

Last month, China sharply lifted its 2023 budget deficit to around 3.8% of gross domestic product from 3% because of the planned issuance of 1 trillion yuan ($137.14 billion) in sovereign bonds.翻译:上个月，由于计划发行1万亿元人民币（1,371.4亿美元）主权债券，中国将2023年预算赤字占国内生产总值的比例从3%大幅提高至3.8%左右。

China is able to achieve economic growth of slightly above 5% this year, Wang said. The government has set an annual growth target of around 5% for 2023.翻译:王说，今年中国经济能够实现略高于5%的增长。政府设定了2023年5%左右的年度增长目标。

Weak external demand and inadequate domestic demand increase overcapacity pressures in China, Wang said.翻译:王说，外需疲软和内需不足增加了中国的产能过剩压力。

($1 = 7.2918 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2918 人民币）

Reporting by Ellen Zhang and Kevin Yao; Editing by Christopher Cushing and Christian Schmollinger翻译:张艾伦和姚凯文报道；克里斯托弗·库欣和克里斯蒂安·施莫林格编辑

item.title: 台湾面临中国压力，在APEC峰会上强调和平的重要性
item.description:
Taiwan will stress the importance of peace in the region at next week's APEC summit, President Tsai Ing-wen said on Friday, one of the few international bodies both Taiwan and China are members of and where their officials meet.翻译:蔡英文总统周五表示，台湾将在下周的亚太经合组织峰会上强调该地区和平的重要性，亚太经合组织是台湾和中国大陆均为其成员且官员会面的少数国际组织之一。

The 21-member Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) forum will meet in San Francisco for the 30th APEC summit, the first hosted by the United States since 2011.翻译:由 21 个成员组成的亚太经合组织 (APEC) 论坛将在旧金山举行第 30 届 APEC 峰会，这是自 2011 年以来首次由美国主办。

Chinese-claimed and democratically ruled Taiwan, which takes part in APEC as "Chinese Taipei" and does not send its president to summits, has faced increased military pressure from Beijing including two rounds of major war games over the past year and a half.翻译:中国声称实行民主统治的台湾以“中华台北”身份参加亚太经合组织，并且不派总统参加峰会，该国面临着来自北京越来越大的军事压力，包括过去一年半里举行的两轮大型军演。

Tsai told reporters at the presidential office that the first message she wanted her representative to APEC, chip giant TSMC (2330.TW), founder Morris Chang, to send at the summit was that Taiwan was dedicated to promoting regional peace and prosperity.翻译:蔡英文在总统府告诉记者，她希望亚太经合组织代表、芯片巨头台积电（2330.TW）创始人张忠谋在峰会上传达的第一个信息是，台湾致力于促进地区和平与繁荣。

"At a time when the world is facing various challenges, we must work together to reduce conflicts in the region and jointly create a peaceful and stable environment for regional economic development," she said.翻译:在世界面临各种挑战之际，我们必须共同努力减少地区冲突，共同为地区经济发展营造和平稳定的环境。

"Taiwan is a reliable, safe, and trustworthy partner in the international community," Tsai added.翻译:蔡英文补充说：“台湾是国际社会可靠、安全、值得信赖的伙伴。”

Chang, speaking after Tsai, said he believed no APEC member would oppose peace, prosperity and development.翻译:张继蔡之后表示，他相信亚太经合组织成员不会反对和平、繁荣与发展。

Neither the president nor Chang, representing Tsai for the sixth time at an APEC summit, took questions.翻译:总统和第六次代表蔡英文出席亚太经合组织峰会的张都没有接受提问。

APEC has traditionally been one the few forums where China and Taiwan talk, even if just in passing for pleasantries.翻译:亚太经合组织传统上是中国和台湾进行对话的少数论坛之一，即使只是顺便聊聊。

China has not formally confirmed President Xi Jinping's attendance at this year's summit.翻译:中国尚未正式确认习近平主席出席今年的峰会。

Chang, 92, had a brief chat with Xi at last year's APEC summit in Bangkok, a rare high-level interaction.翻译:92岁的张在去年曼谷亚太经合组织峰会上与习近平进行了简短交谈，这是一次罕见的高层互动。

China cut off a formal talks mechanism with Taiwan after Tsai first won office in 2016, believing her to be a separatist. Tsai says only Taiwan's people can decide the island's future and strongly rejects China's sovereignty claims.翻译:蔡英文2016年上台后，中国认为她是分裂分子，切断了与台湾的正式对话机制。蔡英文表示，只有台湾人民才能决定台湾的未来，并强烈反对中国的主权主张。

While Chang is now retired from TSMC, he remains influential as the elder statesman of Taiwan's chip industry.翻译:虽然张现已从台积电退休，但他作为台湾芯片行业元老的影响力仍然存在。

Reporting by Sarah Wu; Writing by Ben Blanchard; Editing by Stephen Coates翻译:莎拉·吴报道；本·布兰查德 (Ben Blanchard) 撰写；斯蒂芬·科茨编辑

item.title: 中国最大的银行中国工商银行遭受勒索软件攻击
item.description:
The Industrial and Commercial Bank of China's (ICBC) U.S. arm was hit by a ransomware attack that disrupted trades in the U.S. Treasury on Thursday, the latest in a string of victims ransom-demanding hackers have claimed this year.翻译:周四，中国工商银行（ICBC）美国分行遭受勒索软件攻击，扰乱了美国财政部的交易，这是今年黑客索要赎金的一系列受害者中的最新一起。

ICBC Financial Services, the U.S. unit of China's largest commercial lender by assets, said it was investigating the attack that disrupted some of its systems, and making progress toward recovering from it.翻译:中国资产规模最大的商业银行的美国子公司工银金融服务公司表示，正在调查这起破坏其部分系统的攻击事件，并在恢复方面取得进展。

Hackers lock up a victim organisation's systems in such attacks and demand ransom for unlocking it, often also stealing sensitive data for extortion.翻译:黑客在此类攻击中锁定受害组织的系统，并索要赎金来解锁系统，通常还窃取敏感数据以进行勒索。

Several ransomware experts and analysts said an aggressive cybercrime gang named Lockbit was believed to be behind the hack, although the gang's dark web site where it typically posts names of its victims did not mention ICBC as a victim as of Thursday evening. Lockbit did not respond to a request for comment sent via a contact address posted on its site.翻译:几位勒索软件专家和分析师表示，据信一个名为 Lockbit 的激进网络犯罪团伙是此次黑客攻击的幕后黑手，尽管该团伙通常在其暗网网站上发布受害者姓名，但截至周四晚间并未提及 ICBC 是受害者。 Lockbit 没有回复通过其网站上发布的联系地址发送的置评请求。

"We don’t often see a bank this large get hit with this disruptive of a ransomware attack," said Allan Liska, a ransomware expert at the cybersecurity firm Recorded Future.翻译:网络安全公司 Recorded Future 的勒索软件专家艾伦·利斯卡 (Allan Liska) 表示：“我们很少看到这么大的银行受到如此破坏性的勒索软件攻击。”

Liska, who also believes Lockbit was behind the hack, said ransomware gangs may not name and shame their victims when they are negotiating with them on the ransom demand.翻译:利斯卡也认为 Lockbit 是此次黑客攻击的幕后黑手，他表示勒索软件团伙在与受害者就赎金要求进行谈判时可能不会点名或羞辱受害者。

"This attack continues a trend of increasing brazenness by ransomware groups," he said. "With no fear of repercussions, ransomware groups feel no target is off limits."翻译:他说：“这次攻击延续了勒索软件组织日益肆无忌惮的趋势。” “由于不担心后果，勒索软件组织认为没有任何目标是不受限制的。”

U.S. authorities have struggled to curb a rash of cybercrime, chiefly ransomware actors, who hit hundreds of companies in nearly every industry annually. Just last week U.S. officials said they were working on curtailing the funding routes of ransomware gangs by improving information-sharing on such criminals across a 40-country alliance.翻译:美国当局一直在努力遏制一系列网络犯罪，主要是勒索软件攻击者，这些犯罪行为每年都会袭击几乎每个行业的数百家公司。就在上周， 美国官员表示，他们正在通过 40 个国家联盟改善有关此类犯罪分子的信息共享，努力减少勒索软件团伙的资金来源。

The ICBC did not comment on whether Lockbit was behind the hack. It is common for victim organisations to refrain from publicly disclosing the names of cybercrime gangs.翻译:ICBC 没有评论 Lockbit 是否是此次黑客攻击的幕后黑手。受害者组织通常不公开披露网络犯罪团伙的名称。

Since Lockbit was discovered in 2020, the group has hit 1,700 U.S. organizations, according to the U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA). Last month it threatened Boeing with a leak of sensitive data it said it had found by breaching the company.翻译:据美国网络安全和基础设施安全局 (CISA) 称，自 2020 年 Lockbit 被发现以来，该组织已攻击 1,700 个美国组织。上个月，它威胁波音公司泄露其声称通过入侵该公司发现的敏感数据。

A CISA spokesperson referred questions about the ICBC hack to the U.S. Treasury Department.翻译:CISA 发言人将有关 ICBC 黑客攻击的问题转交给了美国财政部。

While market sources said the impact of the hack appeared limited, it signalled how vulnerable systems at large organizations such as the bank continue to be to cybercriminals. Thursday's incident is likely to raise questions over market participants' cybersecurity controls and draw regulatory scrutiny.

TRADES CLEARED

ICBC said it had successfully cleared Treasury trades executed on Wednesday and repurchase agreements (repo) financing trades done on Thursday.翻译:中国工商银行表示，已成功清算周三执行的国债交易和周四执行的回购协议融资交易。

"In general, the event had a limited impact on the market," said Scott Skrym, executive vice president for fixed income and repo at broker-dealer Curvature Securities.翻译:经纪交易商 Curvature Securities 负责固定收益和回购的执行副总裁 Scott Skrym 表示：“总的来说，该事件对市场的影响有限。”

Some market participants said trades going through ICBC were not settled due to the attack and affected market liquidity. It was not clear whether this contributed to the weak outcome of a 30-year bond auction on Thursday.翻译:一些市场人士表示，由于袭击事件，通过工行进行的交易未能结算，影响了市场流动性。目前尚不清楚这是否导致了周四 30 年期债券拍卖的疲软结果。

"There could have been maybe some technical issues with some participants not being able to access the market fully on the day," said Michael Gladchun, associate portfolio manager, core plus fixed income, at Loomis Sayles.翻译:Loomis Sayles 核心+固定收益副投资组合经理 Michael Gladchun 表示：“可能存在一些技术问题，部分参与者当天无法完全进入市场。”

The Financial Times reported earlier on Thursday that the U.S. Securities Industry and Financial Markets Association (SIFMA) told members that ICBC (601398.SS) had been hit by ransomware that disrupted the U.S. Treasury market by preventing it from settling trades on behalf of other market players.翻译:英国《金融时报》周四早些时候报道称，美国证券业和金融市场协会（SIFMA）告诉会员，中国工商银行（601398.SS）遭到勒索软件攻击，勒索软件阻止其代表其他市场结算交易，扰乱了美国国债市场玩家。

"We are aware of the cybersecurity issue and are in regular contact with key financial sector participants, in addition to federal regulators. We continue to monitor the situation," a Treasury spokesperson said in a response to a question about the FT report. SIFMA declined to comment.翻译:“我们意识到了网络安全问题，除了联邦监管机构之外，我们还与主要金融部门参与者保持定期联系。我们将继续关注事态发展，”财政部发言人在回答有关《金融时报》报告的问题时表示。 SIFMA拒绝发表评论。

The Treasury market appeared to be functioning normally on Thursday, according to LSEG data.翻译:根据伦敦证券交易所数据，周四国债市场似乎运行正常。

item.title: 中国 Zeekr 披露美国 IPO 文件损失扩大，吉利股价下跌
item.description:
China's Zeekr Intelligent revealed wider losses for the first half of the year on Thursday, as the electric car brand made its paperwork public for a stock market listing in New York and said it hoped to use funds raised to expand its product line.翻译:中国的Zeekr智能公司周四公布了今年上半年更大的亏损，该电动汽车品牌公开了在纽约股市上市的文件，并表示希望利用筹集的资金扩大其产品线。

Zeekr, owned by Chinese automaker Geely Auto (0175.HK), had confidentially filed for its initial public offering (IPO) in December last year.翻译:中国汽车制造商吉利汽车（0175.HK）旗下的Zeekr于去年12月秘密申请首次公开募股（IPO）。

The filing confirms a report from Reuters on Thursday, which said Zeekr was looking to make its IPO prospectus public this week. Shares in Geely (0175.HK), Zeekr's parent, fell by more than 2.5% in morning trading on the news of the listing.翻译:该文件证实了路透社周四的报道，该报道称 Zeekr 计划于本周公开其 IPO 招股说明书。受上市消息影响，Zeekr 母公司吉利汽车（0175.HK）股价早盘下跌逾 2.5%。

The company was aiming to raise more than $1 billion, Reuters previously reported, but is now unlikely to breach the billion-dollar mark, according to one of the sources.翻译:据路透社此前报道，该公司的目标是筹集超过 10 亿美元，但据其中一位消息人士称，目前不太可能突破 10 亿美元大关。

In February, Zeekr was valued at $13 billion after a $750 million funding round from investors including Amnon Shashua, CEO and founder of autonomous driving technology company Mobileye Global (MBLY.O), and the Guangzhou city municipal government's investment arm, Yuexiu Industrial Fund.翻译:今年 2 月，在自动驾驶技术公司 Mobileye Global (MBLY.O)首席执行官兼创始人 Amnon Shashua 和广州市政府投资部门越秀产业基金等投资者的 7.5 亿美元融资后，Zeekr 估值达到 130 亿美元。

For the six months ended June 30, Zeekr reported a net loss of 3.87 billion Chinese yuan ($531.34 million), compared with 3.09 billion yuan a year earlier.翻译:截至 6 月 30 日的六个月，Zeekr 报告净亏损 38.7 亿元人民币（合 5.3134 亿美元），而去年同期为 30.9 亿元人民币。

Net revenue, however, more than doubled to 21.27 billion yuan in the same period.翻译:然而，同期净收入增长了一倍多，达到212.7亿元人民币。

The company's current portfolio primarily includes three vehicle models. It plans to launch its first premium sedan model "targeting tech-savvy adults and families" this month and said it also plans to use the funds raised to develop more advanced battery electric vehicle technologies.翻译:该公司目前的产品组合主要包括三种车型。该公司计划本月推出“针对精通技术的成年人和家庭”的首款高级轿车车型，并表示还计划利用筹集的资金开发更先进的电池电动汽车技术。

Risks it flagged to investors included how the Chinese government exerted substantial influence over the conduct of its business and intense competition in China's EV market, which is currently engaged in a price war.

IPO TO TEST FALLOUT OF SINO-U.S. TENSIONS

The listing could mark the first major float in the U.S. by a Chinese company in two years, after the delisting of ride-hailing giant Didi Global from the New York Stock Exchange.翻译:此次上市可能标志着网约车巨头滴滴出行从纽约证券交易所退市后，两年来中国公司在美国首次大规模上市。

Didi had angered Chinese regulators by pushing ahead with its $4.4 billion New York listing despite being asked to put it on hold.翻译:滴滴出行尽管被要求暂停，但仍推进其价值 44 亿美元的纽约上市，此举激怒了中国监管机构。

The episode, together with a longstanding audit dispute between China and the U.S., stalled Chinese companies from seeking U.S. listings. Only six mainland China-based companies launched U.S. IPOs in 2022.翻译:这一事件，加上中美之间长期存在的审计纠纷，阻碍了中国企业寻求美国上市。 2022 年，只有六家中国大陆公司在美国进行 IPO。

Since then, however, Beijing has softened its stance towards companies looking to list internationally, unveiling a set of rules earlier this year to revive such listings, after the U.S. accounting watchdog and China resolved the audit dispute in December 2022.翻译:然而，自那以后，北京方面对寻求国际上市的公司的立场软化了，在美国会计监管机构和中国于 2022 年 12 月解决审计纠纷后，北京方面于今年早些时候公布了一套规则，以恢复此类上市。

But simmering tensions between the world's two biggest economies over trade, intellectual property and the future of Taiwan continue to spill over into the corporate sphere.翻译:但世界最大的两个经济体之间在贸易、知识产权和台湾未来方面不断升温的紧张关系继续蔓延到企业领域。

In August, Intel (INTC.O) had to scrap its $5.4 billion deal to buy Israeli contract chipmaker Tower Semiconductor (TSEM.TA) after their merger agreement expired without regulatory approval from China.翻译:8 月，英特尔(INTC.O)不得不取消其以 54 亿美元收购以色列合约芯片制造商 Tower Semiconductor (TSEM.TA)的交易，因为双方的合并协议在未经中国监管部门批准的情况下到期。

A similar delay also led to DuPont De Nemours (DD.N) ending its $5.2 billion deal to buy electronics materials maker Rogers Corp (ROG.N) last year.翻译:类似的延迟还导致杜邦德内穆尔公司(DD.N)去年终止了以 52 亿美元收购电子材料制造商罗杰斯公司(ROG.N)的交易。

Zeekr will list its shares on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol "ZK".翻译:Zeekr 将在纽约证券交易所上市，股票代码为“ZK”。

Goldman Sachs and Morgan Stanley are the lead underwriters for the IPO.翻译:高盛和摩根士丹利是此次IPO的主承销商。

($1 = 7.2835 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2835 人民币）

Reporting by Niket Nishant and Manya Saini in Bengaluru, Additional reporting by Jaiveer Shekhawat and Mehnaz Yasmin; Editing by Krishna Chandra Eluri, Shilpi Majumdar and Lincoln Feast.翻译:Niket Nishant 和 Manya Saini 在班加罗尔的报道，Jaiveer Shekhawat 和 Mehnaz Yasmin 的补充报道；由 Krishna Chandra Eluri、Shilpi Majumdar 和 Lincoln Feast 编辑。

item.title: 鲍威尔鹰派言论打压亚洲股市下滑
item.description:
Asian stocks fell to their lowest in a week on Friday, while the dollar was firm as elevated Treasury yields weighed on sentiment after hawkish comments from U.S. Fed Chair Jerome Powell extinguished expectations of a peak in interest rates.翻译:周五，亚洲股市跌至一周最低点，而美元坚挺，因美联储主席鲍威尔的鹰派言论浇灭了利率见顶的预期，美国国债收益率上升打压市场情绪。

MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) fell 1% to a one-week low of 486.39, while Japan's Nikkei (.N225) was 0.50% lower.翻译:MSCI 日本以外最广泛的亚太股市指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)下跌 1%，至一周低点 486.39，而日本日经指数(.N225)下跌 0.50%。

U.S. Federal Reserve officials including Powell said on Thursday they are still not sure interest rates are high enough to finish the battle with inflation.翻译:包括鲍威尔在内的美联储官员周四表示，他们仍不确定利率是否高到足以结束与通胀的斗争。

The Fed is "committed to ... monetary policy that is sufficiently restrictive to bring inflation down to 2% over time," Powell said at an International Monetary Fund event.翻译:鲍威尔在国际货币基金组织的一次活动中表示，美联储“致力于......充分限制性的货币政策，以随着时间的推移将通货膨胀率降至 2%”。

"We are not confident that we have achieved such a stance."翻译:“我们对已经达到这样的立场没有信心。”

Powell's comments along with a weak auction of $24 billion in 30-year Treasuries pushed yields higher, casting a shadow on equities and providing support to the dollar.翻译:鲍威尔的言论以及 240 亿美元 30 年期美国国债拍卖的疲软推高了收益率，给股市蒙上阴影，并为美元提供支撑。

"There is no point in corralling the market into expecting cuts until shortly before they look necessary," said Rob Carnell, Asia-Pacific head of research at ING.翻译:荷兰国际集团(ING)亚太区研究主管罗布·卡内尔(Rob Carnell)表示，“在看来有必要之前不久，让市场预期削减是没有意义的。”

Investors have been looking for signs of U.S. interest rates peaking after the Fed held rates steady last week, a move that bolstered speculation that the rate hiking cycle was over, leading to a short-lived rally in risky assets.翻译:美联储上周维持利率稳定后，投资者一直在寻找美国利率见顶的迹象，此举增强了加息周期结束的猜测，导致风险资产短暂上涨。

Carnell said the Fed needs to keep rates and bond yields reasonably high to achieve the tighter financial conditions that will bring about lower inflation and enable the Fed to ultimately cut rates.翻译:卡内尔表示，美联储需要将利率和债券收益率保持在合理的高位，以实现金融条件收紧，从而降低通胀，并使美联储最终能够降息。

"That rhetoric has to continue, 'we're not definitely finished, there's still a chance of more' ... (you) do that right up until the day before you cut," he said.翻译:“这种言论必须继续下去，‘我们还没有完全结束，还有更多的机会’……（你）一直这样做，直到削减的前一天，”他说。

Overnight, the three major U.S. stock indices closed lower, snapping the longest winning streaks for the Nasdaq (.IXIC) and S&P 500 (.SPX) in two years as market optimism over looser monetary policy faded.翻译:隔夜，由于市场对宽松货币政策的乐观情绪消退，美国三大股指收低，纳斯达克指数(.IXIC)和标准普尔 500指数 (.SPX)结束了两年来最长的连涨势头。

China stock (.SSEC) eased 0.6%, while Hong Kong's Hang Seng Index (.HSI) was 1.6% lower as worries over the world's second-biggest economy resurfaced after data on Thursday showed consumer prices dipped back into contraction.翻译:中国股市(.SSEC)下跌 0.6%，而香港恒生指数(.HSI)下跌 1.6%，因周四数据显示消费者价格再次陷入收缩后，对全球第二大经济体的担忧重新浮现。

Tapas Strickland, head of market economics at NAB, said the data keeps the pressure on Beijing to continue with its incremental easing in monetary and fiscal policy.翻译:澳大利亚国民银行(NAB)市场经济主管塔帕斯·斯特里克兰(Tapas Strickland)表示，这些数据继续对北京施加压力，要求其继续逐步放松货币和财政政策。

The yield on 10-year Treasury notes eased 1 basis point to 4.620% in Asian hours, having risen 10.7 bps overnight. The yield on the 30-year Treasury bond fell 2.1 basis points to 4.746% after rising 12.1 bps overnight.翻译:亚洲时段，10 年期国债收益率下跌 1 个基点至 4.620%，隔夜上涨 10.7 个基点。 30年期国债收益率隔夜上涨12.1个基点后下跌2.1个基点至4.746%。

In the currency market, the dollar index held on to its overnight gains and was last at 105.87. The dollar stood near a one-year high at 151.38 yen and touched one-week highs against the Australian and New Zealand dollars.翻译:货币市场方面，美元指数守住隔夜涨幅，最新报105.87。美元兑日元接近一年高点151.38，兑澳元和新西兰元触及一周高点。

U.S. crude eased 0.03% to $75.72 per barrel and Brent was at $80.08, up 0.09% on the day. The oil market has been reeling this week on demand concerns, with a fading war-risk premium triggering a sell-off.翻译:美国原油下跌 0.03%，至每桶 75.72 美元，布伦特原油收于每桶 80.08 美元，当日上涨 0.09%。本周石油市场因需求担忧而陷入困境，战争风险溢价的消退引发了抛售。

Spot gold was little changed at $1,959.74 per ounce and on track for their worst week in more than a month as elevated yield and stronger dollar weighed.翻译:现货黄金价格几乎没有变化，为每盎司 1,959.74 美元，由于收益率上升和美元走强打压，有望创下一个多月以来最糟糕的一周。

Reporting by Ankur Banerjee in Singapore; Editing by Tom Hogue翻译:Ankur Banerjee 新加坡报道；汤姆·霍格编辑

item.title: 早在救援谈判之前，碧桂园就在努力建造房屋、支付账单
item.description:
When China's largest developer Country Garden first skipped debt payments in August, its shares tumbled 14%, marking a reversal of fortunes: from industry poster child to another troubled property company struggling to pay its creditors.翻译:当中国最大的开发商碧桂园8月份首次跳过债务偿还时，其股价暴跌14%，标志着命运的逆转：从行业典范变成了另一家陷入困境、难以偿还债权人的房地产公司。

The same month, Chinese authorities quietly started talks with Ping An asking the insurance group to take a controlling stake in the developer, according to a Reuters report that was denied by Ping An.翻译:据路透社报道，同月，中国当局悄悄开始与平安进行谈判，要求该保险集团持有该开发商的控股权，但平安否认了这一报道。

Interviews with contractors, workers and home buyers, as well as a review of lawsuits involving Country Garden, show that for months before its problems became public, the company was struggling to deliver homes and pay contractors on time.翻译:对承包商、工人和购房者的采访以及对涉及碧桂园的诉讼的审查表明，在其问题公开之前的几个月里，该公司一直在努力按时交付房屋并向承包商付款。

Until the middle of this year, the company was seen by most investors and home buyers as a beacon of strength in a real estate sector grappling with ballooning debt, tighter regulations and slumping sales. It was one of the few developers able to issue state-guaranteed onshore bonds last year and get credit lines from banks in early 2023.翻译:直到今年年中，该公司还被大多数投资者和购房者视为房地产行业的力量灯塔，该行业正在努力应对债务膨胀、监管收紧和销售下滑​​的问题。它是去年能够发行国家担保的境内债券并在 2023 年初获得银行信贷额度的少数开发商之一。

China, the world's second-largest economy, has struggled to recover from COVID shutdowns and issues with its giant property sector. Country Garden's woes highlight the challenge Beijing faces as it seeks to engineer a rescue plan for the company and improve conditions for the wider industry.翻译:作为世界第二大经济体的中国一直在努力从新冠疫情导致的停工和庞大的房地产行业问题中恢复过来。碧桂园的困境突显了北京在寻求为该公司制定救援计划并改善更广泛行业的条件时所面临的挑战。

"Nobody believed that Country Garden would fail. One important reason is that it seemed to have the implicit guarantee from the state," the Economist Intelligence Unit's Xu Tianchen told Reuters.翻译:“没有人相信碧桂园会失败。一个重要原因是它似乎有国家的隐性担保，”经济学人智库的徐天辰告诉路透社。

Observers believed Country Garden, which has liabilities of around $190 billion and more than 3,000 projects under development, was "good enough and big enough to escape a default or a collapse," he added.翻译:他补充说，观察人士认为，碧桂园负债约 1,900 亿美元，有 3,000 多个正在开发的项目，“足够好、足够大，可以避免违约或倒闭”。

Examples of Country Garden's earlier financial strains, reported here for the first time, include: A valve supplier unpaid since 2022; a steel provider partially paid with apartments; homeowners and workers reporting projects stalled from as early as January; and a Country Garden subsidiary which told a court earlier this year it was "insolvent and overwhelmed."翻译:在此首次报道的碧桂园早期财务紧张的例子包括： 一家阀门供应商自 2022 年以来一直未付款；钢铁供应商部分支付公寓费用；房主和工人报告项目早在一月份就陷入停滞；碧桂园的一家子公司今年早些时候向法庭表示，该公司“资不抵债，不堪重负”。

Lawsuits involving Country Garden and its contractors, including disputes over delayed construction and missing payments, have jumped to a record 459 cases this year, according to data compiled by EIU’s Xu.翻译:根据 EIU 的 Xu 汇编的数据，今年涉及碧桂园及其承包商的诉讼，包括延迟施工和拖欠付款的纠纷，已跃升至创纪录的 459 起。

Country Garden declined to comment.翻译:碧桂园拒绝置评。

After its default, Country Garden has stressed that delivery of homes will remain its top priority, saying last week it had delivered around 460,000 units in the first 10 months of 2023.翻译:违约后，碧桂园强调交付房屋仍将是其首要任务，上周表示，该公司在 2023 年前 10 个月已交付约 46 万套住宅。

In July, only weeks before it skipped debt payments, Country Garden launched a campaign on its WeChat channel titled “Beautiful Delivery”, showcasing newly built apartments and happy homeowners. Some of the projects, it said, were even delivered ahead of schedule.

'FACING LOSSES'

While disputes and delays are par for the course for any large developer, and data in China is often incomplete, the court documents shed light on a contrast between the image Country Garden presented publicly and some of its challenges behind closed doors.翻译:尽管争议和延误对任何大型开发商来说都是司空见惯的事情，而且中国的数据往往不完整，但法庭文件揭示了碧桂园公开展示的形象与闭门造车面临的一些挑战之间的对比。

In a case over alleged delayed delivery of apartments in the central megacity Chongqing, the local Country Garden subsidiary told the court it owed 60 million yuan ($8.2 million) in project payments and "faced severe financial losses and was unable to cover its liabilities", according to a verdict handed down in June.翻译:在中央大城市重庆涉嫌延迟交付公寓的案件中，碧桂园当地子公司告诉法院，其欠下 6000 万元人民币（820 万美元）的工程款，并且“面临严重的财务损失，无法偿还债务”，根据六月份作出的判决。

It said it was, "insolvent and overwhelmed, and even if the court reduced the damages at its own discretion, it may still be hard for the defendant to fulfill its obligations in the future."翻译:其表示，“资不抵债，不堪重负，即使法院自行裁量减少损害赔偿，被告今后仍可能难以履行其义务。”

Other court cases feature similar examples from last year and early this year: They involve sums as small as 267,475 yuan in arrears for 50% of an elevator installation fee or 2.8 million yuan demanded by an electrical installation company.翻译:去年和今年年初的其他法院案件也有类似的例子：其中涉及拖欠电梯安装费50%的267,475元或电气安装公司索要的280万元。

Some large contractors decided to skip the court process altogether, according to a steel supplier based in south China. He told Reuters "the priority for us is to get our money back through negotiations instead of filing a lawsuit, which is very time-consuming and won’t necessarily yield a satisfactory result."翻译:据华南一家钢铁供应商称，一些大型承包商决定完全跳过法庭程序。他告诉路透社，“我们的首要任务是通过谈判拿回我们的钱，而不是提起诉讼，这非常耗时，而且不一定会产生令人满意的结果。”

Country Garden owed the supplier, who did not want to be identified due to the sensitivity of the situation, an equivalent of several million dollars for reinforced steel bars.翻译:碧桂园欠该供应商相当于数百万美元的钢筋，由于情况敏感，该供应商不愿透露姓名。

He was promised half of the owed amount in unfinished apartments. The other half was to be paid in cash, but the supplier has so far only received a quarter of the payment.翻译:他得到了半数未完工公寓欠款的承诺。另一半则以现金支付，但供应商迄今为止只收到了四分之一的货款。

"The situation deteriorated from the second half of 2022, and it’s become even worse from the start of this year, when the payment to us was delayed,” said the supplier.翻译:该供应商表示：“从2022年下半年开始，情况就开始恶化，从今年年初开始，情况变得更糟，我们的付款被推迟了。”

The impact of Country Garden’s cash crunch has reverberated even after the missed August payments.翻译:即使在八月份未能付款之后，碧桂园现金紧缩的影响仍然产生了影响。

A week after that, contractor Qiao Jingjing, said his construction site in Xinzheng, a city of 1.2 million in Henan Province, also stalled.翻译:一周后，承包商乔晶晶表示，他位于河南省新郑市（拥有 120 万人口的城市）的建筑工地也陷入停滞。

Qiao, 38, was left with 20,000 yuan in unpaid wages for two months of his work. He said his company, Jujiang Group, which was a subcontractor at the site installing aluminum sheets, is owed more than 770,000 yuan.翻译:38岁的乔被拖欠了两个月的工资2万元。他说，他的公司钜江集团是现场安装铝板的分包商，欠债超过77万元。

Country Garden did not respond to questions about the payment or delivery disputes.翻译:碧桂园没有回应有关付款或交货纠纷的问题。

Qiao said apartment buyers and construction workers kept coming to Country Garden offices seeking information.翻译:乔说，公寓买家和建筑工人不断来到碧桂园办公室寻求信息。

"But Country Garden's sales staff have never given us any reply to these questions: When will the construction resume? When can the property be handed over to the owners? When will the workers get their wages?”翻译:“但碧桂园的销售人员从来没有给我们任何答复：什么时候恢复施工？什么时候可以把房产交给业主？工人什么时候可以拿到工资？”

($1 = 7.2800 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2800 人民币）

item.title: 中国驻美国大使：中美关系仍面临挑战
item.description:
China's ambassador to the United States said Sino-US relations have shown positive signs of stopping a decline and stabilising but still faced challenges, as the leaders of both countries prepare for an expected highly-anticipated meeting this month.翻译:中国驻美国大使表示，中美关系出现止跌企稳的积极迹象，但仍面临挑战，两国领导人正在为本月备受期待的会晤做准备。

The most important thing was to find the right way for China and the United States to get along, Xie Feng said in a video speech on Thursday at the Forum on U.S.-China Relations in Hong Kong.翻译:谢锋周四在香港美中关系论坛上发表视频讲话时表示，最重要的是找到中美正确的相处之道。

Xie said under the leadership of China's President Xi Jinping and U.S. President Joe Biden, and with the joint efforts of both sides, relations have recently shown positive signs.翻译:谢大使表示，在习近平主席和拜登总统领导下，在双方共同努力下，近年来中美关系出现积极迹象。

"Sino-U.S. relations are still facing severe challenges, and there is still a long way to go to stabilise and improve relations," Xie said.翻译:谢说：“中美关系仍面临严峻挑战，稳定和改善关系任重而道远。”

Xie also said both sides believe that it was beneficial and necessary for China and the United States to maintain dialogue, both hoped that Sino-U.S. relations will stabilise and improve as soon as possible, and agreed to make joint efforts toward that at an anticipated San Francisco summit.翻译:谢旭人还表示，双方认为中美双方保持对话是有益的、必要的，都希望中美关系尽快稳定和改善，并同意在预期的峰会上共同努力。弗朗西斯科峰会。

Xi and Biden are expected to meet on the sidelines of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) forum in San Francisco, which starts Nov. 15.翻译:习近平和拜登预计将在 11 月 15 日开幕的旧金山亚太经济合作组织 (APEC) 论坛期间会面。

The two leaders, who have been at odds over a number of global issues including trade, national security and Taiwan, last saw each other almost a year ago on the sidelines the G20 summit in Bali.翻译:两位领导人在贸易、国家安全和台湾等一系列全球问题上存在分歧，最后一次见面是在大约一年前的巴厘岛 G20 峰会期间。

Reporting by Bernard Orr; Editing by Chris Reese and Michael Perry翻译:伯纳德·奥尔报道；克里斯·里斯和迈克尔·佩里编辑

item.title: 美元兑日元汇率有望创三个月来最佳表现；加密飞跃
item.description:
The dollar was headed for its best week against the yen in three months on Friday, after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell and a chorus of Fed officials poured cold water on market expectations of a peak in U.S. rates.翻译:周五，美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔和一众美联储官员对市场对美国利率见顶的预期泼了一盆冷水，美元兑日元汇率周五迎来三个月来最好的一周。

In cryptocurrencies, bitcoin and ether held near multi-month highs, with renewed speculation over the imminent approval of an exchange-traded bitcoin fund breathing new life into the digital assets.翻译:在加密货币方面，比特币和以太币保持在数月高点附近，人们重新猜测交易所交易的比特币基金即将获得批准，为数字资产注入新的活力。

A slew of Fed policymakers including Powell on Thursday said they are still not sure that interest rates are high enough to finish the battle with inflation, comments taken as hawkish by markets and which sent the greenback rising.翻译:包括鲍威尔在内的多位美联储政策制定者周四表示，他们仍不确定利率是否足够高以结束与通胀的斗争，市场认为这些言论属于强硬态度，这导致美元上涨。

The dollar stood near a one-year high at 151.38 yen on Friday and touched one-week highs against the Australian and New Zealand dollars.翻译:周五美元兑日元接近一年高点151.38，兑澳元和新西兰元触及一周高点。

"Powell's speech was quite hawkish, and that just really hit sentiment," said Tina Teng, market analyst at CMC Markets.翻译:CMC Markets 市场分析师 Tina Teng 表示：“鲍威尔的讲话相当强硬，这确实打击了市场情绪。”

The remarks from Fed officials came a week after the U.S. central bank left interest rates steady and cemented expectations that rates could have peaked, causing the dollar and Treasury yields to tumble in the aftermath.翻译:美联储官员发表上述言论一周前，美联储维持利率稳定，并强化了利率可能已见顶的预期，导致美元和国债收益率随后暴跌。

The greenback, however, regained its footing this week and was eyeing a weekly gain of roughly 1.3% against the yen, its best performance since August.翻译:然而，美元本周重新站稳脚跟，兑日元有望每周上涨约 1.3%，这是自 8 月份以来的最佳表现。

"Dollar/yen did trend higher this week and it's now back above 151. It does raise the risk of the BOJ stepping into the (forex) market to strengthen the yen, but I think markets are expecting no intervention unless dollar/yen moves to about 152," said Carol Kong, a currency strategist at Commonwealth Bank of Australia.翻译:“美元/日元本周确实走高，目前已回到 151 上方。这确实增加了日本央行进入（外汇）市场以强化日元的风险，但我认为市场预计不会进行干预，除非美元/日元走势大约152，”澳大利亚联邦银行货币策略师Carol Kong表示。

The Aussie and the kiwi were likewise headed for a 2.4% and 1.8% weekly decline against the dollar respectively, also their steepest drop in months.翻译:澳元和新西兰元兑美元的周跌幅同样分别为 2.4% 和 1.8%，也是数月来的最大跌幅。

"Even though we don't expect Powell to deliver on the tightening bias, that tightening bias does support the dollar," said Kong.翻译:Kong表示：“尽管我们预计鲍威尔不会兑现紧缩倾向，但这种紧缩倾向确实支撑了美元。”

The Australian dollar last stood at $0.6359 after slipping to a one-week low of $0.6352 earlier in the session, while the New Zealand dollar was last at $0.5893, having similarly hit a one-week trough of $0.5886 earlier.翻译:澳元兑美元在盘中早些时候跌至一周低点 0.6352 美元后，最终报于 0.6359 美元，而纽元兑美元最后报于 0.5893 美元，此前同样触及一周低点 0.5886 美元。

Falling oil prices and a faltering economic recovery in China have also kept a lid on the Antipodean currencies.翻译:油价下跌和中国经济复苏步履蹒跚也限制了澳大利亚货币的走势。

Australia's central bank, in its quarterly Statement on Monetary Policy released on Friday, warned there were risks of further upside surprises to inflation following its latest hike in interest rates, while also raising forecasts for economic growth and employment.翻译:澳大利亚央行在周五发布的季度货币政策声明中警告称，在最近一次加息后，通胀可能会出现进一步意外上行的风险，同时还上调了对经济增长和就业的预测。

Elsewhere, the euro steadied at $1.0668, while sterling slipped 0.02% to $1.2218. They were both on track to lose 0.56% and 1.3% for the week, respectively.翻译:其他方面，欧元稳定在1.0668美元，而英镑下跌0.02%至1.2218美元。这两家公司本周预计分别下跌 0.56% 和 1.3%。

Bitcoin , the world's largest cryptocurrency, meanwhile held near an 18-month high and last bought $36,519, having peaked at $37,978 in the previous session, its highest level since May 2022.翻译:与此同时，全球最大的加密货币比特币保持在 18 个月高点附近，最后买入 36,519 美元，前一交易日最高达到 37,978 美元，为 2022 年 5 月以来的最高水平。

The second-largest cryptocurrency Ether last stood at $2,102.90, after similarly jumping to its highest since April of $2,131.50 in the previous session.翻译:第二大加密货币以太币最后报至 2,102.90 美元，前一交易日同样跃升至 4 月份以来的最高点 2,131.50 美元。

Prices of the digital assets have surged on swirling speculation of an imminent approval of BlackRock's spot bitcoin ETF, with the asset management giant also having registered to create an ethereum trust.翻译:由于贝莱德现货比特币 ETF 即将获得批准的猜测不断，数字资产的价格飙升，这家资产管理巨头也已注册创建以太坊信托。

"The potential approval of spot ETFs by the (U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission) could significantly impact the cryptocurrency sector," said Carl Szantyr, managing partner of digital asset hedge fund Blockstone Capital.翻译:数字资产对冲基金 Blockstone Capital 的执行合伙人 Carl Szantyr 表示：“（美国证券交易委员会）可能批准现货 ETF 可能会对加密货币行业产生重大影响。”

"Such an endorsement would make it more accessible for institutional investors to enter the crypto space, likely boosting demand and subsequently, prices."翻译:“这样的认可将使机构投资者更容易进入加密领域，可能会提振需求，进而提振价格。”

Reporting by Rae Wee; Editing by Lincoln Feast.翻译:Rae Wee 报道；林肯·盛宴编辑。

item.title: 讲解员：什么是中国的光棍节？如何庆祝？
item.description:
Black Friday? No. Cyber Monday? Nope. Prime Day? Absolutely not. The world's biggest shopping event happens in China each year - and it's called Singles Day.翻译:黑色星期五？不，网络星期一？没有。黄金日？绝对不。世界上最大的购物活动每年都会在中国举行，这天被称为“光棍节”。

Originally a holiday to celebrate being single, as a counter to Valentine's Day, the event has grown into a weeks-long online shopping festival that peaks on Nov. 11.

WHEN DID THE IDEA OF SINGLES DAY ORIGINATE?

The idea for Singles Day had originated at China's Nanjing University back in 1993 and was originally called "Bachelor's Day." On the day, single people treat themselves with gifts and presents, while also organizing social gatherings and parties.

HOW MUCH DO CONSUMERS SPEND?

Last year, the total value of goods sold during the shopping bonanza - also known as "Double 11" - totaled 1.15 trillion yuan ($157.97 billion), according to data from consultancy firm Bain.翻译:根据咨询公司贝恩的数据，去年购物热潮（又称“双11”）期间销售的商品总价值达1.15万亿元人民币（1579.7亿美元）。

That is more than four times the $35.3 billion U.S. shoppers spent last year during Cyber Week, the period from Black Friday to Cyber Monday, per data from Adobe Analytics.翻译:根据 Adob​​e Analytics 的数据，这是去年美国购物者在网络周（即黑色星期五到网络星期一期间）花费的 353 亿美元的四倍多。

Cyber Monday immediately follows Black Friday, which falls on the day after the U.S. Thanksgiving Day holiday, the busiest shopping day of the year in the United States.翻译:网络星期一紧随黑色星期五之后，黑色星期五恰逢美国感恩节假期后的第二天，这是美国一年中最繁忙的购物日。

But growth has been slowing even as overall sales for Singles Day hit record highs, with last year's 3% rise marking the slowest increase ever. The event has in recent years lost some of its novelty with the rise of other shopping festivals in China, including the midyear "618" sales that are the country's second largest.翻译:但尽管双十一的整体销售额创下历史新高，增长速度却一直在放缓，去年的增长 3%，创下有史以来最慢的增幅。近年来，随着中国其他购物节的兴起，其中包括中国第二大购物节“618”，该活动失去了一些新鲜感。

Strict COVID-19 curbs in China impacted sales last year, but several industry experts are expecting a rebound, as the economy improves and livestream sales remain robust.翻译:中国对 COVID-19 的严格限制影响了去年的销售，但几位行业专家预计，随着经济好转和直播销售保持强劲，销量将会反弹。

"We're optimistic about growth this year because the recovery seems to be stabilizing and consumption is on a more clear upward trend," said Jacob Cooke, co-founder and CEO of Beijing-based WPIC Marketing + Technologies.翻译:总部位于北京的 WPIC Marketing + Technologies 联合创始人兼首席执行官雅各布·库克 (Jacob Cooke) 表示：“我们对今年的增长持乐观态度，因为复苏似乎正在趋于稳定，消费呈现出更加明显的上升趋势。”

His e-commerce consultancy firm expects sales for the Chinese shopping event to rise in the range between 14% and 18% from last year, which is higher than Adobe's projection for a 5.4% rise in Cyber Week sales.

WHAT MAJOR BRANDS AND PRODUCTS ARE SHOPPERS BUYING?

While Alibaba 9988.HK started "Double 11" in 2009 to win over online shoppers with discounts and promotions, China's major e-commerce platforms now all take part in it.翻译:阿里巴巴9988.HK于2009年启动“双11”，以打折促销的方式吸引网购消费者，如今中国各大电商平台都参与其中。

JD.com (9618.HK) joined in 2012 and PDD Holdings-owned (PDD.O) Pinduoduo has also become a significant player, offering low cost products in competition with Alibaba-owned Tmall and Taobao platforms.翻译:京东（9618.HK）于2012年加入，拼多多控股（PDD.O）拼多多也成为重要参与者，提供低成本产品，与阿里巴巴旗下的天猫和淘宝平台竞争。

Last year, Chinese shoppers spent more on essentials, supplements, vitamins and pet-care products. Those products are expected to stay in demand this year, along with more lifestyle-focused products such as athletic wear and sports equipment.翻译:去年， 中国消费者在必需品、补充剂、维生素和宠物护理产品上的支出增加。这些产品以及运动服装和运动器材等更多注重生活方式的产品预计今年将保持需求。

"There is enormous demand among Chinese consumers for products and services that improve their lifestyles and facilitate self-expression," Cooke said.

HOW DOES SINGLES DAY COMPARE TO BLACK FRIDAY?

In comparison, U.S. shoppers last year had bought more Pokemon toys, Hot Wheels, TVs, footwear and air fryers during the key Black Friday and Cyber Monday shopping periods, according to Adobe.翻译:据 Adob​​e 称，相比之下，去年美国消费者在黑色星期五和网络星期一的关键购物时段购买了更多的口袋妖怪玩具、风火轮、电视、鞋类和空气炸锅。

From 2014 until 2021, Singles Day had posted growth rates of about 34% annually on average, versus Cyber Week's 17% average gain, according to data from consultancy Bain and from Adobe Analytics.

WHAT OTHER COMPANIES HOPE TO BENEFIT?

Several American companies from apparel makers Nike (NKE.N) and Lululemon (LULU.O) to cosmetics firm Estee Lauder (EL.N) and consumer goods giant Procter & Gamble (PG.N) have a big presence on the Tmall marketplace and stand to benefit from the event.翻译:从服装制造商耐克(NKE.N)和 Lululemon (LULU.O)到化妆品公司雅诗兰黛(EL.N)和消费品巨头宝洁公司(PG.N) 等多家美国公司在天猫市场上占有重要地位，并能从此次活动中获益。

Last year, Apple (AAPL.O), Nike and L'Oreal (OREP.PA) were also among the biggest winners from the event, along with Chinese home appliance makers such as Haier and Midea and sportswear brand Anta.翻译:去年，苹果(AAPL.O) 、耐克和欧莱雅(OREP.PA)也是该活动的最大赢家，此外还有海尔、美的等中国家电制造商以及运动服装品牌安踏。

Nike said in December "Double 11" demand in Greater China grew by mid-teens, outpacing the broader sports industry, with demand from Gen Z consumers for the brand growing by 45% during the shopping period in China on Tmall.翻译:耐克表示，去年 12 月“双 11”期间，大中华区的需求增长了 15%，超过了整个体育行业的增速，Z 世代消费者在中国天猫购物期间对该品牌的需求增长了 45%。

JD.com had noted Apple sold more than 1 billion yuan worth of products in the first minute of the event's final sales period.翻译:京东指出，苹果在活动最后销售期的第一分钟就售出了价值超过10亿元人民币的产品。

However, for this year, several global companies ranging from L'Oreal to Estee Lauder have taken a cautious stance around the spending spree in China during the shopping event.翻译:然而，今年，从欧莱雅到雅诗兰黛等多家跨国公司都对购物活动期间在中国的消费热潮持谨慎态度。

"The presale period of Tmall and particularly on -- in general, the Singles Day, confirms a softer trend versus a year ago," said Estee Lauder CEO Fabrizio Freda last week, adding that the company was more optimistic about the next part of the Singles Day events in November.翻译:雅诗兰黛首席执行官法布里奇奥·弗雷达 (Fabrizio Freda) 上周表示：“天猫的预售期，尤其是双十一，证实了与一年前相比疲软的趋势。”他补充说，该公司对接下来的销售情况更加乐观。十一月的光棍节活动。

L'Oreal CEO Nicolas Hieronimus on a post earnings call with analysts in October said it was too soon to comment on "Double 11."翻译:欧莱雅首席执行官 Nicolas Hieronimus 在 10 月份与分析师举行的财报电话会议上表示，现在对“双 11”发表评论还为时过早。

"The shy consumers are less shy during the big events, and we have seen that whether it's during Valentine's Day, whether it is 6/18, the market has had its best peaks of growth during this moment," Hieronimus said, adding he had lots of hope for the shopping bonanza.翻译:Hieronimus 表示：“害羞的消费者在大型活动期间不再那么害羞，我们看到，无论是情人节期间，还是 6/18，市场都在这一刻迎来了最佳的增长高峰。”对购物狂潮抱有很大的希望。

($1 = 7.2800 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2800 人民币）

item.title: 欧盟与中国将于12月举行峰会
item.description:
The European Union and China are set to hold a summit in December, a spokesperson for European Council President Charles Michel said on Thursday, confirming an earlier Bloomberg News report.翻译:欧洲理事会主席查尔斯·米歇尔的发言人周四表示，欧盟和中国将于 12 月举行峰会，这证实了彭博新闻社早些时候的报道。

While Bloomberg said the summit would take place on Dec. 7-8, Michel's spokesperson said the exact date was not set yet.翻译:虽然彭博社表示峰会将于 12 月 7 日至 8 日举行，但米歇尔的发言人表示，具体日期尚未确定。

item.title: 美国立法者公布法案要求私募股权公司披露中国投资
item.description:
Two U.S. senators introduced a bipartisan bill on Thursday that would require private equity firms to make public how much they invest in China and other countries of concern.翻译:两名美国参议员周四提出了一项两党法案，要求私募股权公司公开其在中国和其他相关国家的投资金额。

The bill, introduced by Democratic Senator Bob Casey and Republican Senator Rick Scott, is the latest effort to track U.S. investments in China.翻译:该法案由民主党参议员鲍勃·凯西和共和党参议员里克·斯科特提出，是追踪美国在华投资的最新举措。

"The American people deserve to know where and how their savings are being invested," Casey said in a statement.翻译:凯西在一份声明中说：“美国人民应该知道他们的储蓄被投资到哪里以及如何投资。”

Reuters exclusively reported on the bill earlier Thursday.翻译:路透社周四早些时候独家报道了该法案。

The United States has sought to crack down on U.S. investment in China over fears U.S. dollars and know-how are aiding Beijing's technological advances to modernize its military.翻译:由于担心美元和技术正在帮助北京实现军事现代化的技术进步，美国一直试图打击美国对华投资。

U.S. private investment firms have poured more than $80 billion into China between 2018 and 2022, some via pension plans, according to Casey's office.翻译:凯西办公室称，2018年至2022年间，美国私人投资公司已向中国注入超过800亿美元，其中一些是通过养老金计划。

The new congressional measure would require private equity funds to annually disclose assets invested in China, Iran, Russia and North Korea to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, which would then be required to make public a report based on the information.翻译:新的国会措施将要求私募股权基金每年向美国证券交易委员会披露在中国、伊朗、俄罗斯和朝鲜投资的资产，然后要求美国证券交易委员会根据这些信息公开一份报告。

It would also require disclosure of certain information about private security sales.翻译:它还要求披露有关私人证券销售的某些信息。

"Our adversaries, like Communist China, benefit from a complete lack of transparency," Rick Scott said in a statement. "It is time to stop sending American dollars to these countries of concern."翻译:里克·斯科特在一份声明中表示：“我们的对手，比如共产主义中国，受益于完全缺乏透明度。” “是时候停止向这些令人担忧的国家发送美元了。”

A spokesperson for the Chinese embassy in Washington did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:中国驻华盛顿大使馆发言人没有立即回应置评请求。

Casey has also co-sponsored a measure that would require government notification of investments in certain sensitive technology sectors in China. That measure has been added as an amendment to the Senate's National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA) and may or may not survive reconciliation with the House's version.翻译:凯西还共同发起了一项措施，要求政府通报对中国某些敏感技术领域的投资。该措施已作为参议院国防授权法案 (NDAA) 的修正案添加，并且可能会也可能不会在与众议院版本协调后继续存在。

The new bill also comes in the wake of an executive order on outbound investment to prohibit some U.S. investments in China in semiconductors and microelectronics, quantum computing and artificial intelligence, and require notification of others. The order has not yet been implemented.翻译:这项新法案也是在一项关于对外投资的行政命令之后出台的，该命令禁止美国在中国对半导体和微电子、量子计算和人工智能的部分投资，并要求其他方面进行通报。该命令尚未执行。

Reporting by Karen Freifeld; Editing by Sharon Singleton and Lisa Shumaker翻译:凯伦·弗赖菲尔德报道；莎朗·辛格尔顿和丽莎·舒梅克编辑

item.title: 澳门业务复苏 永利度假村第三季度盈利好于预期
item.description:
Casino operator Wynn Resorts (WYNN.O) beat third-quarter profit estimates on Thursday, as strength in gaming, luxury retail and hotel bookings drove steady demand at its Macau properties.翻译:赌场运营商永利度假村(WYNN.O)周四第三季度利润超出预期，原因是博彩、奢侈品零售和酒店预订的强劲推动了其澳门酒店的稳定需求。

The post-pandemic travel rebound in Macau has been a tailwind for casino operators such as Wynn Resorts.翻译:澳门疫情后旅游业的反弹对永利度假村等赌场运营商来说是一个顺风车。

The results come ahead of the Nov. 10 strike deadline from Las Vegas hospitality workers over a new labor contract.翻译:该结果是在 11 月 10 日拉斯维加斯酒店业工人就新劳动合同进行罢工的最后期限之前公布的。

The unions representing hospitality workers in Las Vegas have been negotiating for about seven months for higher wages, stronger protections against new technology that may threaten jobs, a reduction in steep quotas for housekeepers and improved safety for workers.翻译:代表拉斯维加斯酒店业工人的工会已经就提高工资、加强对可能威胁就业的新技术的保护、减少管家的大幅配额以及提高工人安全等问题进行了大约七个月的谈判。

While competitors MGM Resorts International (MGM.N) and Caesars Entertainment (CZR.O) have reached a tentative deal with the unions, Wynn Resorts has yet to yield an agreement.翻译:虽然竞争对手米高梅国际度假村(MGM.N)和凯撒娱乐(CZR.O)已与工会达成初步协议，但永利度假村尚未达成协议。

It previously said it has negotiations scheduled with the unions on Thursday.翻译:该公司此前表示已计划于周四与工会进行谈判。

Shares of the company fell 4.7% in trading after the bell.翻译:盘后交易中，该公司股价下跌 4.7%。

The company posted adjusted profit of 99 cents per share in the third quarter, compared with analysts' average estimate of 75 cents per share, according to LSEG data.翻译:根据 LSEG 数据，该公司第三季度调整后利润为每股 99 美分，而分析师平均预期为每股 75 美分。

Its total revenue was $1.67 billion during the period, while analysts expected $1.59 billion.翻译:其期内总营收为 16.7 亿美元，而分析师预期为 15.9 亿美元。

Reporting by Anandita Mehrotra and Aishwarya Jain in Bengaluru; Editing by Shilpi Majumdar翻译:Anandita Mehrotra 和 Aishwarya Jain 在班加罗尔的报道；希尔皮·马宗达尔编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 共和党人要求拜登在芬太尼和囚犯问题上挑战中国习近平
item.description:
Republicans in the U.S. Congress urged President Joe Biden to make demands of China's leader Xi Jinping over detained Americans and other issues when they meet next week in San Francisco, arguing that Washington's push to engage Beijing had "negligible benefit."翻译:美国国会共和党人敦促总统乔·拜登下周在旧金山举行会议时就被拘留的美国人和其他问题向中国领导人习近平提出要求，他们认为华盛顿推动与北京接触的“好处微乎其微”。

The Biden-Xi meeting around events at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) forum will follow a series of largely unreciprocated U.S. cabinet-level visits to China, as the U.S. seeks to recover from a diplomatic crisis over its downing of a suspected Chinese spy balloon flying over the United States in February.翻译:拜登和习近平围绕亚太经合组织（APEC）论坛上的活动举行会晤，此前美国对中国进行了一系列基本上未得到回应的内阁级访问，美国正寻求从击落一名疑似中国人引发的外交危机中恢复过来。二月份，间谍气球飞越美国上空。

Republicans and Democrats in Congress have offered sometimes different approaches for countering China's growing economic and military might despite bipartisan consensus on the need to do so.翻译:尽管两党都认为有必要这样做，但国会中的共和党人和民主党人有时会提出不同的方法来对抗中国日益增长的经济和军事实力。

The 13 Republicans on the House of Representative's bipartisan select committee on China, led by chairman Mike Gallagher, credited the Biden administration in a letter made public on Thursday for strengthened semiconductor export controls and restrictions on outbound investment toward China.翻译:由主席迈克·加拉格尔 (Mike Gallagher) 领导的众议院两党中国特别委员会的 13 名共和党人在周四公开的一封信中称赞拜登政府加强了半导体出口管制和对中国对外投资的限制。

But they asked Biden to present Xi with a list of 10 demands to improve relations, much like Beijing did to U.S. officials in 2021.翻译:但他们要求拜登向习近平提出一份改善关系的10项要求清单，就像北京在2021年对美国官员所做的那样。

Their demands included that China release all Americans the U.S. considers wrongfully detained, take measures over the flow of chemicals used in the opioid fentanyl, cease unsafe intercepts of U.S. ships and aircraft in international waters, and stop the harassment of Philippines ships around a disputed shoal in the South China Sea.翻译:他们的要求包括，中国释放美国认为错误拘留的所有美国人，对阿片类芬太尼所用化学品的流动采取措施，停止在国际水域不安全拦截美国船只和飞机，并停止骚扰有争议浅滩附近的菲律宾船只。在南中国海。

The lawmakers said they shared Biden's desire to deter a conflict, but that the president's engagement push had come at an "unacceptable cost" to competitive or defensive actions that have been "delayed, scuttled, or otherwise dropped."翻译:议员们表示，他们和拜登一样希望阻止冲突，但总统的接触推动付出了“不可接受的代价”，而竞争性或防御性行动却“被推迟、破坏或以其他方式放弃”。

"So far, these very real tradeoffs have led to negligible benefit," they said.翻译:“到目前为止，这些非常现实的权衡带来的好处可以忽略不计，”他们说。

Meanwhile, the letter said Beijing had taken no steps to stop military provocations in the South China Sea or toward the democratically governed island of Taiwan, which China claims as its own.翻译:与此同时，信中称，北京没有采取任何措施阻止在南海或对民主治理的台湾岛的军事挑衅，中国声称台湾拥有主权。

The U.S. also had taken few recent actions toward China specifically regarding human rights issues, the lawmakers wrote, adding that for nearly two years the U.S. had not imposed sanctions on Chinese officials over the erosion of Hong Kong's autonomy or for allegations of rights abuses in China's Xinjiang region and had not expanded trade restrictions under the Treasury Department's Chinese Military-Industrial Complex Companies List.翻译:议员们写道，美国最近也没有针对中国采取一些专门针对人权问题的行动，并补充说，近两年来，美国没有因香港自治受到侵蚀或中国侵犯人权的指控而对中国官员实施制裁。新疆地区，并没有扩大财政部中国军工综合体公司名单下的贸易限制。

"It is clear that competitive actions have been sacrificed to advance aimless, zombie-like engagement," they said.翻译:他们表示：“很明显，为了促进漫无目的、僵尸般的参与，竞争性行动被牺牲了。”

The White House did not respond immediately to a request for comment on the letter.翻译:白宫没有立即回应对这封信发表评论的请求。

China denies allegations by Western governments that it abuses human rights.翻译:中国否认西方政府对其侵犯人权的指控。

Families of Americans the U.S. government has classified as wrongfully detained in China, including Texas-based businessman Mark Swidan, Chinese-American Kai Li and pastor David Lin, have also repeatedly urged the government to prioritize the release of their loved ones in talks with Chinese officials.翻译:被美国政府列为在中国被错误拘留的美国人的家属，包括德克萨斯州商人马克·斯维丹（Mark Swidan）、美籍华人李凯（Kai Li）和牧师大卫·林（David Lin），也一再敦促政府在与中国人的谈判中优先释放他们的亲人官员。

China says such cases are handled according to law.翻译:中方表示，此类案件将依法处理。

Reporting by Michael Martina and Patricia Zengerle; editing by Grant McCool翻译:迈克尔·马丁纳和帕特里夏·曾格勒报道；格兰特·麦库尔编辑
item.author: Michael Martina

item.title: 美国财政部长耶伦希望与中国副总理进行“公开且实质性”的会谈
item.description:
U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen on Thursday told Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng she wants to have an "open and substantive" discussion on the U.S.-China economic relationship, Beijing's subsidy practices and global challenges such as climate change and debt relief.翻译:美国财政部长珍妮特·耶伦周四对中国国务院副总理何立峰表示，她希望就美中经济关系、北京的补贴做法以及气候变化和债务减免等全球挑战进行“公开和实质性”的讨论。

In prepared remarks at the start of two days of bilateral meetings in San Francisco ahead of a summit of Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) country leaders, Yellen said she has worked in recent months to establish an economic dialogue with her Chinese counterparts.翻译:在亚太经合组织（APEC）国家领导人峰会之前，耶伦在旧金山举行的为期两天的双边会议开始时发表了事先准备好的讲话，她表示，近几个月来，她一直致力于与中国同行建立经济对话。

"I hope to build on this strong foundation with an open and substantive discussion over the next two days," Yellen said. "The United States has no desire to decouple from China: A full separation of our economies would be economically disastrous for both our countries, and for the world."翻译:耶伦表示：“我希望在接下来的两天里通过公开和实质性的讨论来建立这个坚实的基础。” “美国无意与中国脱钩：我们经济的全面分离将对我们两国和世界造成经济灾难。”

Instead, Yellen said the U.S. seeks a healthy economic relationship with China that benefits both countries over the long term and will raise concerns about Chinese policies that prohibit fair competition.翻译:相反，耶伦表示，美国寻求与中国建立健康的经济关系，使两国长期受益，并将对中国禁止公平竞争的政策表示担忧。

Yellen's second face-to-face meeting with He since she visited Beijing in July is among a series of cabinet-level engagements that paved the way for U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinping to meet on the sidelines of the APEC summit next week.翻译:耶伦自7月访问北京以来与贺建奎的第二次面对面会面是一系列内阁级别的接触之一，为美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平下周在亚太经合组织峰会期间会面铺平了道路。

The Biden administration is hoping to use the meetings in San Francisco to limit the economic fallout from US-Sino tensions and keep the lines of communication open on key issues. U.S. Treasury officials, however, have sought to downplay expectations for any breakthroughs.翻译:拜登政府希望利用旧金山的会议来限制美中紧张局势造成的经济影响，并在关键问题上保持沟通渠道畅通。然而，美国财政部官员试图淡化对任何突破的预期。

In her prepared remarks, Yellen said she looks forward to discussing collaboration on global challenges, from climate change to debt distress in low-income countries, adding that the U.S. and China "have an obligation to lead" on these issues.翻译:耶伦在准备好的讲话中表示，她期待讨论应对从气候变化到低收入国家债务困境等全球挑战的合作，并补充说美国和中国“有义务在这些问题上发挥领导作用”。

She also said she intends to discuss U.S. plans for continued national security restrictions on certain technology exports and on U.S. investment in China.翻译:她还表示，打算讨论美国继续对某些技术出口和美国对华投资实施国家安全限制的计划。

"The United States will continue to take targeted actions to protect our and our allies' national security. But we are also committed to communicating clearly about these actions to prevent any misunderstandings or miscalculations. And we welcome more clarity on China's thinking and actions," Yellen said.翻译:“美国将继续采取有针对性的行动，保护我们和我们盟友的国家安全。但我们也致力于就这些行动进行明确沟通，以防止任何误解或误判。我们欢迎中国更加明确地了解其想法和行动。”耶伦说道。

Reporting by David Lawder; Editing by Paul Simao翻译:大卫·劳德报道；保罗·西毛编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国汽车制造商蔚来汽车高管仍在“争论”2025年进入北美市场
item.description:
Chinese automaker Nio (9866.HK) is still "debating" a 2025 entry in North America, a top executive said on Thursday.翻译:中国汽车制造商蔚来汽车（9866.HK）一位高管周四表示，仍在“讨论”2025 年进入北美市场的计划。

Speaking at Reuters Events Automotive USA 2023 conference, Ganesh Iyer, chief executive officer of Nio USA, said the company is considering "any kind of partnerships" in North America.翻译:Nio USA 首席执行官 Ganesh Iyer 在路透社活动的 2023 年美国汽车会议上发表讲话时表示，该公司正在考虑在北美建立“任何形式的合作伙伴关系”。

Nio also needs to build infrastructure before bringing electric vehicles to North America, he said.翻译:他说，在将电动汽车引入北美之前，蔚来还需要建设基础设施。

Nio sees an "immersive user experience" as a differentiator for the brand, Iyer said.翻译:艾耶表示，蔚来汽车将“沉浸式用户体验”视为该品牌的差异化因素。

Reporting by Paul Lienert in Detroit; Editing by Mark Porter翻译:保罗·利纳特 (Paul Lienert) 底特律报道；马克·波特编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国敦促G7停止“煽动对抗”
item.description:
China expressed strong dissatisfaction with China-related comments made by G7 foreign ministers and urged the bloc to stop inciting confrontation, its embassy in Japan said in a statement on Thursday.翻译:中国驻日本大使馆周四发表声明称，中方对七国集团外长发表的涉华言论表示强烈不满，敦促七国集团停止煽动对抗。

A two-day G7 foreign minister meeting held in Tokyo ended on Wednesday and mainly called for humanitarian pauses in the Israel-Hamas war to allow in aid and help the release of hostages.翻译:周三在东京举行的为期两天的七国集团外长会议主要呼吁暂停以色列与哈马斯的战争，以允许援助并帮助释放人质。

In a joint statement, the G7 nations also urged China to address its non-market policies, not to assist Russia in its war against Ukraine, to keep the peace and stability across the Taiwan Strait, and to allow a high level of autonomy for Hong Kong.翻译:七国集团在一份联合声明中还敦促中国纠正其非市场政策，不要协助俄罗斯对乌克兰的战争，维护台海和平与稳定，并允许香港高度自治。孔.

"China will resolutely counter any smear campaigns from external forces," the embassy said, adding it strongly protested against other countries' intentions to curb China with regards to Taiwan.翻译:使馆表示，中方将坚决反制外部势力的抹黑行为，对其他国家在台湾问题上遏制中国的企图表示强烈抗议。

President Tsai Ing-wen, of the democratically governed Taiwan island, said she would continue to work with G7 members toward a free and open Indo Pacific.翻译:民主统治的台湾岛的总统蔡英文表示，她将继续与七国集团成员合作，以实现自由开放的印度太平洋地区。

Critical comments on Taiwan and Hong Kong have long riled Beijing, which considers such criticism as outside interference in its domestic affairs.翻译:对台湾和香港的批评言论长期以来一直激怒北京，北京认为此类批评是外部势力干涉其内政。

Democratically governed Taiwan, which China considers as part of its territory, is the most sensitive issue. Taiwan rejects Beijing’s claim.翻译:中国认为民主统治的台湾是其领土的一部分，这是最敏感的问题。台湾拒绝北京的主张。

Some Western nations have also regularly reminded Beijing to better protect Hong Kong’s democratic principles, freedoms and autonomy, which they say have weakened after the implementation of a national security law in 2020.翻译:一些西方国家还经常提醒北京更好地保护香港的民主原则、自由和自治，他们称这些原则在2020年实施国家安全法后受到削弱。

Hong Kong returned from British to Chinese rule in 1997 with the guarantee its freedoms would be protected under a "one country, two systems" formula for at least 50 years.翻译:香港于1997年从英国统治下回归中国，并保证其自由将在“一国两种制度”下受到至少50年的保护。

Reporting by Albee Zhang and Ryan Woo; Additional reporting by Ben Blanchard; Editing by Bernadette Baum翻译:Albee 张和 Ryan Woo 的报道；本·布兰查德 (Ben Blanchard) 的补充报道；伯纳黛特·鲍姆编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 阿根廷大选使中巴关系成为焦点
item.description:
Argentina could see a resetting of some global ties depending on the result of its run-off presidential election later this month - although the value of trade with partners like China and Brazil may outweigh any short-term political posturing.翻译:阿根廷可能会看到一些全球关系的重置，具体取决于本月晚些时候第二轮总统选举的结果，尽管与中国和巴西等合作伙伴的贸易价值可能超过任何短期政治姿态。

While Economy Minister Sergio Massa, a pragmatist in the ruling left-leaning coalition, has signaled policy continuity, radical libertarian candidate Javier Milei has sharply lambasted China, Brazil, the pope, South America's Mercosur trade bloc and the China-led BRICS group.翻译:尽管执政的左翼联盟中的实用主义者、经济部长塞尔吉奥·马萨表示政策连续性，但激进的自由主义候选人哈维尔·米莱却严厉斥责了中国、巴西、教皇、南美南方共同市场贸易集团和中国领导的金砖国家集团。

Massa and Milei will compete in a Nov. 19 head-to-head that looks likely to be a tight race, with angry voters deeply divided amid inflation running at nearly 140%, two-fifths of the population in poverty, sky-high interest rates and capital controls hurting the economy.翻译:马萨和米莱将于 11 月 19 日进行正面交锋，这场比赛看起来可能会是一场激烈的角逐，愤怒的选民在通胀率接近 140%、五分之二的人口陷入贫困、利益极高的情况下严重分歧利率和资本管制损害了经济。

The vote could impact the global positioning of Argentina, South America's No. 2 economy, which is a major grains exporter as well as a lithium and shale producer. But years of volatility have made some international investors wary and it is the top debtor to the International Monetary Fund (IMF).翻译:此次投票可能会影响南美第二大经济体阿根​​廷的全球地位，该国是主要谷物出口国以及锂和页岩油生产国。但多年的波动让一些国际投资者保持警惕，而且它是国际货币基金组织（IMF）的最大债务国。

Gustavo Martinez Pandiani, current Argentine ambassador to Switzerland and Massa's likely foreign minister, said a future Massa government would seek to improve the country's global partnerships.翻译:现任阿根廷驻瑞士大使、可能担任马萨外交部长的古斯塔沃·马丁内斯·潘迪亚尼表示，未来的马萨政府将寻求改善该国的全球伙伴关系。

"While some promise to cut ties with Brazil or China, we want more markets and more trading partners, not less," he said.翻译:“虽然一些人承诺切断与巴西或中国的关系，但我们希望有更多的市场和更多的贸易伙伴，而不是更少，”他说。

Milei has said he "won't make deals with communists" in China or Brazil, though he does back private trade. He has described climate change as a "lie of socialism" and said Argentine Pope Francis is "on the side of bloody dictatorships."翻译:米雷表示，他“不会与中国或巴西的共产党人做交易”，但他确实支持私人贸易。他将气候变化描述为“社会主义的谎言”，并表示阿根廷教皇弗朗西斯“站在血腥独裁者一边”。

Diana Mondino, Milei's likely foreign minister, said some of his statements had been blown out of context, and that in fact he would look "to reinsert Argentina into the world."翻译:米莱可能担任外交部长的戴安娜·蒙迪诺表示，他的一些言论已经断章取义，事实上他会寻求“让阿根廷重新融入世界”。

"Not only is there not a problem with Brazil, but we hope to be able to trade as much as possible with Brazil," said Mondino, adding that with China - a key trade partner, creditor and investor - Milei would simply stop opaque state-to-state deals.翻译:蒙迪诺表示：“不仅与巴西没有问题，而且我们希望能够与巴西进行尽可能多的贸易。”他补充说，与中国这个重要的贸易伙伴、债权人和投资者相比，米莱将简单地停止不透明的国家- 州交易。

That could include the country's $18 billion currency swap line with China, which has helped cash-strapped Argentina pay back its IMF debt. China is also a big investor in local lithium projects, hydro and nuclear.翻译:这可能包括该国与中国的 180 亿美元货币互换额度，该额度帮助现金短缺的阿根廷偿还了国际货币基金组织的债务。中国也是当地锂项目、水电和核电项目的重要投资者。

"What we are not going to do are secret contracts. Argentina, this government, in the last 20 years, has had multiple secret negotiations," she said. "That is not normal and it is what we have said we are not going to do."翻译:“我们不会做的是秘密合同。阿根廷政府在过去20年里进行了多次秘密谈判，”她说。 “这是不正常的，我们已经说过我们不会这样做。”

A current senior Foreign Ministry source, from the same Peronist coalition as Massa, predicted that Argentina's ties with Brazil and China would continue regardless of who won the election.翻译:一位与马萨同属庇隆主义联盟的现任外交部高级消息人士预测，无论谁赢得选举，阿根廷与巴西和中国的关系都将继续下去。

"Relations with China are going to go as they have until now with either of the two candidates. The intense trade that exists with them cannot be dissolved," the person said, asking not to be identified.翻译:这位不愿透露姓名的人士表示：“与中国的关系将像两位候选人中的任何一位一样，与中国的关系将继续发展。与他们之间存在的激烈贸易关系无法消除。”

"The same thing would happen with Brazil: bad personal relations do not affect trade."翻译:“同样的事情也会发生在巴西：糟糕的个人关系不会影响贸易。”

TRADE BLOCS: MERCOSUR AND BRICS翻译:贸易集团：南方共同市场和金砖国家

Massa and Milei have also clashed on Mercosur, the regional trade bloc led by Argentina and Brazil that has faced internal tension from other members who say it is not an effective trade mechanism for negotiating global deals.翻译:马萨和米莱还在南方共同市场问题上发生了冲突，南方共同市场是由阿根廷和巴西领导的区域贸易集团，该集团面临着其他成员的内部紧张局势，他们称这不是谈判全球协议的有效贸易机制。

The Peronists want to strengthen the bloc, while Milei has threatened to pull Argentina out of it.翻译:庇隆主义者希望加强欧盟，而米莱则威胁要让阿根廷退出欧盟。

Pandiani said member countries needed to "modernize Mercosur to make it more efficient," and added that a Massa government would consider it their "main platform" for global trade.翻译:潘迪亚尼表示，成员国需要“实现南方共同市场的现代化，以提高其效率”，并补充说，马萨政府将把它视为全球贸易的“主要平台”。

"Argentina has a very promising future, because it has what the world demands: proteins; traditional, green and transition energy; critical minerals such as lithium and copper; rare earths and qualified human resources," he said.翻译:他说：“阿根廷的未来非常有前途，因为它拥有世界所需要的东西：蛋白质；传统、绿色和转型能源；锂和铜等关键矿物；稀土和合格的人力资源。”

The current government has also pushed to have Argentina in the China-backed BRICS group of developing countries, which also includes India, Brazil, Russia and South Africa. Argentina was invited to join the group in August. Milei opposes joining.翻译:本届政府还推动阿根廷加入中国支持的金砖国家集团，该集团还包括印度、巴西、俄罗斯和南非。阿根廷于八月受邀加入该小组。米莱反对加入。

"The BRICS are not a trading bloc. As of now it's not clear why we would want to have membership in this group," said Mondino. The BRICS are a relatively loosely-formed group with diverse political and geographical positions.翻译:“金砖五国不是一个贸易集团。目前还不清楚我们为什么希望成为这个集团的成员，”蒙迪诺说。金砖国家是一个结构相对松散的组织，具有不同的政治和地理位置。

Pandiani disagreed. "Rejecting entry into BRICS is nonsense; we believe that Argentina should always sit at the negotiating tables where important issues for our future are discussed," he said.翻译:潘迪亚尼不同意。 “拒绝加入金砖国家是无稽之谈；我们认为阿根廷应该始终坐在谈判桌上，讨论我们未来的重要问题，”他说。
